cause.description:
We think that London has already screwed up its chances of holding a safe and sucsessful olympics in 2012- just look at the 40, 00 quid logo lets teel ken livingstone that its a waste of space, money and time!!!
join our cause
1. THE LOGO IS RUBBISH AND COST TOO MUCH
2. THE OLYMPICS WONT BE SAFE
3. TAXPAYERS CANT AFFORD IT
cause.mission: Stop the olyimpics from happening in London in 2012
cause.name: SCREW THE LONDON OLYMPICS!!!
